Text:
This is a fab programme, times and attitudes really are changing :o)

(shame the narrator uses the wrong pronouns)

Usually these children are broken by their parenting.  Most don't have same-house father, or the house lives under a gaga type culture, like Hollywood espousal. Diet can be another factor.

Sad to hear these children are victims of social engineering.  Lost lives that will most likely never have family security in their adult lives.
Porkster....are you serious? Diet?? Educate yourself about genetic factors and stfu w/your nonsense.

Sorry Porkster but our sexuality and preference is in our DNA. It is true people experiment sexually but people are hard wired the way they are...Diet and deprogramming won't help. Just like it won't help with your own sexuality.  You are who you are, and how you were born.
